summary:
- **Substantial Holder Update (Tembo Capital Mining Fund II LP & Ndovu Capital X B.V.)**  
  - **Current Holding**: 1,081,799,892 ordinary shares (15.36% voting power, diluted from 16.47% due to capital raising).  
  - **Change Trigger**: Orion issued 191.9M new shares (part of capital raising announced 08/07/2025), diluting existing holdings.  
  - **No change in actual shares held** by Tembo/Ndovu; voting power reduced solely due to increased share count (now 7,042,300,377 shares on issue).  

*Note: No material capital markets impact identified beyond dilution effect.*
